author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MOISTURE FROM MARIO COULD AFFECT THE SOUTHWESTERN UNITED STATES BY THURSDAY...
summary: ...MOISTURE FROM MARIO COULD AFFECT THE SOUTHWESTERN UNITED STATES BY THURSDAY... As of 8:00 AM PDT Tue Sep 16 the center of Mario was located near 22.7, -117.2 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MOISTURE FROM MARIO COULD AFFECT THE SOUTHWESTERN UNITED STATES BY THURSDAY... As of 8:00 AM PDT Tue Sep 16 the center of Mario was located near 22.7, -117.2 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
